text.welcomeText: Hey this is Tony from the Next Door Pub & Pizzeria.
text.welcomeText1: Would you like to order a pizza today?
text.welcomeText2: Tony from the Next Door Pub & Pizzeria is here to help!
text.welcomeText3: Do want to order what you ordered last time or something else?
text.askPhoneNumber: Perfect! What is your phone number?
text.morePizza: Great! Would you like any other pizza’s?
text.sides: Would you like to add an order of garlic bread for $3.50?
text.orderReady: Awesome! Your order will be ready in about 30 mins.
text.textClub: Would you like to join our text club for faster service and specials in the future?
text.finishText: Great! Hope you have a great day

addPizzaText.type: Great! What pizza would you like?
addPizzaText.toppings: Perfect! Do you want everything on it?

text.fallbackText1: We’re sorry but we’re having trouble. To better serve you, give us a call us at 888-888-8888 and we’ll be happy to help!
text.fallbackText2: We’re sorry, but we only offer Pizza ordering for now. Do you like ordering this way, if so Reply YES and we’ll get thinking on adding the entire menu
